0.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from:now()-3h
| parse releasesVersion, """DATA 'version=\'' DATA:version '\','"""
| fields product = releasesProduct, stage = releasesStage, version
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)
| filter product == $Product or $Product == "All"
| filter stage == $Stage or $Stage == "All"
| filter version == $Version or $Version == "All"
| dedup product, stage, version
0.title: Overview

10.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| parse releasesVersion, """DATA 'version=\'' DATA:version '\','"""
| fields product=releasesProduct, stage=releasesStage, version, id
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)
| filter product == $Product or $Product == "All"
| filter stage == $Stage or $Stage == "All"
| filter version == $Version or $Version == "All"
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)
| lookup [fetch security.events
| filter event.category == "VULNERABILITY_MANAGEMENT"
| filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
| filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
| filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
| expand pgiId=affected_entity.affected_processes.ids
| dedup pgiId, vulnerability.id
//| fields pgId, vulnerability.id
| summarize by:{pgiId}, {critical = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "CRITICAL"), high = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "HIGH"), medium = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "MEDIUM"), low = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "LOW"), total=count()}
], sourceField:id, lookupField:pgiId, fields:{critical, high, medium, low, total}
| summarize {Vulnerabilities=toLong(sum(total))}
10.title: Number of Vulnerabilities

11.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from:now()-3h
| parse releasesVersion, """DATA 'version=\'' DATA:version '\','"""
| fields id, entity.name, product=releasesProduct, stage=releasesStage, version
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)
| filter product == $Product or $Product == "All"
| filter stage == $Stage or $Stage == "All"
| filter version == $Version or $Version == "All"
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)
| lookup [fetch security.events
  | filter event.category == "VULNERABILITY_MANAGEMENT"
  | filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
  | filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
  | filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
  | expand pgiId=affected_entity.affected_processes.ids
  | dedup pgiId, vulnerability.id
  //| fields pgId, vulnerability.id
  | summarize by:{pgiId}, {critical = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "CRITICAL"), high = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "HIGH"), medium = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "MEDIUM"), low = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "LOW"), total=count()}
  ], sourceField:id, lookupField:pgiId, fields:{critical, high, medium, low, total}
| fields  entity.name, product, stage, version, critical, high, medium, low

12.content:
### Release Validations

This section provides both an overview and a detailed view of release validation results. Ensure that the guardian is tagged with both `product` and `stage` to accurately correlate validation results with the corresponding release information. To further investigate a specific result, right-click a row in the table and select "Open value with" to launch the Site Reliability Guardian. 

---

13.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "guardian.validation.finished"
| parse guardian.tags, "JSON:tags"
| filter tags[stage][0] == $Stage or $Stage == "All"
| filter tags[product][0] == $Product or $Product == "All"
| summarize count(), by: validation.status

14.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "guardian.validation.finished"
| parse guardian.tags, "JSON:tags"
| filter tags[stage][0] == $Stage or $Stage == "All"
| filter tags[product][0] == $Product or $Product == "All"
| parse validation.summary, "JSON:Objective_Result"
| fields Time = timestamp, Guardian = guardian.name, Status = validation.status, Objective_Result, guardian.id, validation.id
| sort Time

2.content:
## Release Monitoring

This dashboard offers real-time visibility into software deployments and their impact on system performance. It automatically detects releases, correlates them with validation results, and highlights security vulnerabilities. This allows teams to quickly validate changes, detect regressions, and improve deployment confidence.

---

3.content:
### Security Vulnerabilities

This section displays the number of vulnerabilities identified per release, categorized by severity. It also includes a detailed table listing the affected service entities.

---

4.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from:now()-3h
| parse releasesVersion, """DATA 'version=\'' DATA:version '\','"""
| fields product=releasesProduct, stage=releasesStage, version, id
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)
| filter product == $Product or $Product == "All"
| filter stage == $Stage or $Stage == "All"
| filter version == $Version or $Version == "All"
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)
| lookup [fetch security.events
  | filter event.category == "VULNERABILITY_MANAGEMENT"
  | filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT" // historical vulnerability data
  | filter event.level=="ENTITY" // on entity level
  | filter vulnerability.resolution.status == "OPEN"
  | expand pgiId=affected_entity.affected_processes.ids
  | dedup pgiId, vulnerability.id
  //| fields pgId, vulnerability.id
  | summarize by:{pgiId}, {critical = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "CRITICAL"), high = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "HIGH"), medium = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "MEDIUM"), low = countIf(vulnerability.risk.level == "LOW"), total=count()}
  ], sourceField:id, lookupField:pgiId, fields:{critical, high, medium, low, total}
| summarize by:{product, stage, version}, {critical=toLong(sum(critical)), high=toLong(sum(high)), medium=toLong(sum(medium)), low=toLong(sum(low)), total=toLong(sum(total))}
4.title: Overview

5.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| parse releasesVersion, """DATA 'version=\'' DATA:version '\','"""
| fields product=releasesProduct, stage=releasesStage, version, id

| filter product == $Product or $Product == "All"

| filter version == $Version or $Version == "All"
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)

6.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from:now()-3h
| parse releasesVersion, """DATA 'version=\'' DATA:version '\','"""
| fields name = entity.name, product = releasesProduct, stage = releasesStage, version, dt.entity.process_group_instance = id
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)
| filter product == $Product or $Product == "All"
| filter stage == $Stage or $Stage == "All"
| filter version == $Version or $Version == "All"
| filter isNotNull(product) and isNotNull(stage) and isNotNull(version)
6.title: Instances

variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| fields  releasesVersion, releasesProduct, releasesStage
| filter isNotNull(releasesProduct) and isNotNull(releasesStage) and isNotNull(releasesVersion)
| dedup releasesStage
| fields releasesStage = array("All", releasesStage)

fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| fields  releasesVersion, releasesProduct, releasesStage
| filter isNotNull(releasesProduct) and isNotNull(releasesStage) and isNotNull(releasesVersion)
| parse releasesVersion, """LD "version='" LD:version "'" """
| filter $Stage == "All" or releasesStage == $Stage
| dedup releasesProduct
| fields releasesProduct = array("All", releasesProduct)

fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| fields  releasesVersion, releasesProduct, releasesStage
| filter isNotNull(releasesProduct) and isNotNull(releasesStage) and isNotNull(releasesVersion)
| parse releasesVersion, """LD "version='" LD:version "'" """
| filter $Product == "All" or releasesProduct == $Product
| filter $Stage == "All" or releasesStage == $Stage
| filter isNotNull(version)
| dedup version
| fields version = array("All", version)
